long_description: Tenure:  Please confirm if this is a freehold or leasehold property with Silverman Black Silverman Black is delighted to offer this good size two bedroom first floor apartment, located on the popular Mullards Close development, only about 10 minutes walk away from Hackbridge BR station. Set in well maintained communal grounds which border the River Wandle, the flat comprises a welcoming entrance hall, a good size open plan living room, a well equipped kitchen, two well proportioned bedrooms and a refitted shower room. The property does require some cosmetic attention, but was the subject of a substantial refurbishment programme in 2016, when the bathroom and kitchen were entirely replaced by the current owner. Other benefits include new flooring, and entryphone security system, double glazing (although the windows do need some attention). Externally, there is off street parking for the residents and extensive communal gardens. Hackbridge centre with the new Lidl supermarket and well regarded Hackbridge First school are only 7 minutes walk away, whilst Hackbridge BR station is 9 minutes walk - just under half a mile - whilst tram services to Wimbledon & Beckenham are available at Mitcham Junction which is just under 1 mile distant. Viewing is very strongly recommended - so call today to organise your viewing! Brochures Mullards Close, Mitcham Brochure

long_description: The Personal Agent is delighted to welcome to the market this well presented, one bedroom ground floor apartment set on a popular leafy residential road within easy walking distance to both Sutton and West Sutton railway stations. The property is a conversion flat and is set within a beautiful period property boasting a spacious and bright open plan kitchen/dining/living space with high ceilings throughout the property. The huge bay window allows for plenty of natural light. Across the entrance hallway is the bathroom with a white suite comprising of bath with shower above.  The double bedroom has a door which provides direct access to the large communal garden. To the front of the property is allocated parking, and with the addition of a new boiler and the fact it comes to market with a share of the freehold and no maintenance charges your early viewing is highly recommended. The property is sold with no onward chain and would be ideal for first time buyers or investors. The property boasts easy access to London Waterloo from Sutton Railway Station (Approx. 28 minutes, Zone 5) and Cheam Railway Station (Approx. 32 minutes, Zone 5). The local area has outstanding grammar schools located within close proximity, such as Nonsuch High School for Girls and Sutton Grammar School. Tenure: Leasehold. With substantial ground floor accommodation PLUS a large GARDEN OFFICE/SUMMER HOUSE, this distinctive home offers flexible living space that is ideally suited to the changing needs of a growing family.  With such homes currently in short supply we can only urge early viewing to avoid disappointment - call us today to reserve your viewing. Brochures Burdon Lane, South Cheam

bullet_points: 1 Bedroom;Private Balcony;Shared Outside Gardens;Entrance Hall;Living/Dining Room;Kitchen;Bathroom;Secure Entry System;Long Lease;Share of Freehold
long_description: Epitomising modern, contemporary style, this superb one bedroom apartment offers the owners a sanctuary from everyday working life with its open plan living space blending with a well-proportioned fitted kitchen and a large private balcony. Commuters and professionals requiring quick and easy access into Central London have the choice of two mainline stations at Sutton and Cheam, both within easy walking distance. Cheam Village and Sutton town centre are both within easy reach, offering an array of shops, bars, restaurants and amenities.  Accommodation comprises a spacious entrance hall with two storage cupboards, a luxury bathroom, a light and airy living/dining room, a fitted kitchen with plenty of wall and base units and a double bedroom with fitted wardrobes.  Externally, the property features a private balcony looking over shared outside gardens, secure entry phone system, allocated resident’s parking and visitor’s parking.  The property also benefits from being share of freehold with a long lease. Brochures Web Details Particulars

This spacious studio apartment offers a large living room/dining room/bedroom, separate kitchen, modern bathroom and a storage cupboard in the entrance hall.  Outside, you will find an allocated parking space and communal gardens.  No onward chain. bullet_points: Retirement living – 65 years and over;Fitness studio;Slate & Grain brasserie, bar and coffee lounge;Homeowners' club lounge;Hobby room;Landscaped outdoor terraces;24-hour on-site staff presence;Guest suite;Within Zone 4 - London Victoria is 25 mins direct;On-site parking (separate charge)
long_description: Retirement Homes that stand apart! A home is so much more than just bricks and mortar. It's a place where memories are made and moments are shared with friends, neighbours and family. Each home at Brio Button House has been carefully designed with this in mind. Brio homes are built to the highest standards combining the best in traditional craftsmanship and modern building techniques. Here at Button House we offer one and two-bedroom apartments over four floors, with a range of layouts to suit your lifestyle and living arrangement needs. The unique community at Brio Button House looks and feels like no other. From beautiful apartments to welcoming social spaces, every detail has been designed with you in mind. Life here is all about enjoying a healthier, happier lifestyle and having the freedom to do what you want, when you want. From the inviting landscaped terraces to the fitness suite and community hub - the social heartbeat of Button House - you'll find everything right on your doorstep. Plus, the Slate & Grain brasserie, bar and coffee lounge offers the perfect place to bring friends and family together over good food, good drink and good conversation. Located in the London Borough of Sutton, just nine miles south of Charing Cross Station, Button House is part of the New Mill Quarter development, situated opposite Hackbridge railway station in a well-established residential area. You will find everything you need right on your doorstep, as well as being moments from 58 hectares of green open space. The area is extremely well-served with transport links including approximately half hour journeys to London Victoria (by train) and Gatwick Airport (by car). At the heart of New Mill Quarter is Hackbridge Gardens, a central open space complete with seating and plenty of greenery. Photos are indicative only, listing relates to 'The Varsity', other property styles are also available, open weekends will start 28th May until 19th June. Please get in touch for details. All measurements have been taken as a guide to prospective buyers only, and are not precise. Please be advised that some of the particulars may be awaiting vendor approval. If you require clarification or further information on any points, please contact us, especially if you are traveling some distance to view. Fixtures and fittings other than those mentioned are to be agreed with the seller.   HLN220090/2 Brochures Web Details Full Brochure PDF

long_description: Sought after village location with surrounding park land, set within its own green, communal grounds is this generous second floor two double bedroom apartment forming part of the ever popular Carlton Towers development, that is ready for you to stamp your mark on it. Served by a lift and staircase is this bright and airy 17ft’8 by 19ft’9 duel aspect living room, kitchen, family shower room, three storage cupboards in the entrance hall and your own garage. Entrance to the garage and parking is accessed by using a key fob.  Located within 300m of local shops, for example M&S Food and Nisa. Across the road is a gym for all your fitness needs. Also Carshalton Ponds, Grove Park and Carshalton High street are within 0.6 mi.  Carshalton Station (served by Southern and Thameslink) is within 500m with fast direct services to London Victoria and the City. Bus stops adjacent to the property provide routes to Morden Underground station and shopping centres of Sutton and Wallington. No chain ‘As this property is Leasehold, it is likely that you will be responsible for additional charges. Please contact us for more details on these charges and the remaining length of the lease’

long_description: New to the market is this two bedroom well maintained flat in Sutton, London. Located on Avenue Road, the property comprises a hall upon entry, two double bedrooms with the master bedroom benefitting from an en suite shower room, a well-designed open-plan living room/kitchen and a family bathroom. To the rear of the property is a residents car park with an allocated covered parking space. Further key features include underfloor heating, air conditioning in all rooms, integrated appliances, and free street parking. There is a row of shops within close proximity, as well as multiple schools and nurseries within walking distance, supermarkets and other local amenities. Belmont Station - 0.3 miles Cheam Station - 1.2 miles Sutton Station - 1.4 miles  All stations have direct trains to London Victoria and London Bridge.  Early viewing is recommended to appreciate all the features this property has to offer

long_description: This lovely two bedroom, 2nd Floor purpose built flat is being offered for sale with No Onward Chain.   The property is almost equal distance from Mitcham & Wallington train stations and local shops.  Security entryphone system, large lounge/dining room, modern fitted kitchen, fabulous modern bathroom, two good size bedrooms, garage en bloc. This lovely, well presented two bedroom, second floor purpose built flat is being offered for sale with No Onward Chain.   The property briefly comprises a bright & spacious lounge/dining room that leads into a lovely modern fitted kitchen that boasts a range of fitted cupboards and drawers with worktop surfaces and space for the usual appliances.  There are two good size bedrooms and a modern refurbished bathroom.  Outside, there are communal gardens , security Entryphone system and the property comes with a garage en bloc.

Ideally situated for local parks, shops and transport links is this spacious two bedroom first floor flat. The property benefits from double glazing, a15ft open plan living dining room, residents parking and has a lovely modern and bright interior. Viewing recommended! Accommodation  - Security phone entry system, part glazed door leading into communal hall, stairs to 1st floor. Door leading into lobby area. Wooden front door leading into Entrance Hall Security phone entry system, modern electric heater, wood laminate floor, storage cupboard housing water tank.  Living Dining Room 15’10 x 11’08 Coved ceiling, wood laminate floor, UPVC double glazed windows to front aspect. Kitchen 8’09 x 7’01 Laminate worksurface with drawers and cupboards below, matching wall units above, 1 1/2 bowl sink with chrome mixer tap, integrated electric double oven and gas hob with chrome extractor hood above, space and plumbing for washing machine, tiled splashback, tiled floor, UPVC double glazed window to rear aspect. Bedroom One 15’05 x 10’09 Built in wardrobes, modern electric heater, wood laminate floor, UPVC double glazed window to front aspect. Bedroom Two 8’10 x 6’06 Coved ceiling, modern electric heater, wood laminate floor, UPVC double glazed window to rear aspect.  Bathroom 7’07 x 5’07 Panel enclosed bath with chrome mixer tap, shower screen, 'Mira' power shower, vanity wash hand basin with chrome mixer tap and storage below, low-level pushbutton flush WC, heated chrome towel rail, tiled walls, vinyl floor, UPVC obscure double glazed window to front aspect. WILLIAMS HARLOW ESTATE AGENTS IN CHEAM ARE PLEASED TO OFFER THIS two double bedroom ground floor spacious apartment located in this popular and very convenient residential road which is situated in the sought after 'South Sutton' area.  It is a mere stroll into Sutton High Street giving easy access to the many shops, bars and restaurants that the area has to offer, as well as superb transport links to London Victoria and London Bridge in under 40 minutes.  There are many popular schools in the area including Sutton High and Homefield Prep. long_description: SUMMARY A sizable detached four bedroom home situated on a sought after South Wallington residential road with potential to further extend. We urge you to view ASAP DESCRIPTION This handsome house is offered to the market chain free and has plenty to offer to any family looking to move into the area or upsize.  Guests and occupiers are well catered with a driveway for multiple cars, on road parking available to the front, as well as a garage. On the ground floor the property benefits from a bright entrance hall, good-size kitchen with utility area, WC, and three reception rooms with doors leading to a rear level garden, that offers a patio area. The first floor comprises of four bedrooms, and two family bathrooms. One of the family bathroom has a bath and separate shower cubicle with the having a shower cubicle, WC and hand basin. On the landing there is access to the loft, which offer further scope to extend. Overall, the house feels spacious and very functional, with the possibility that any new owner would be able to extend the rear of the home and into the loft (STPP). Externally the garden measures circa 150ft. The large patio leads off from the house and onto the lawn. The large level garden provides ample space to enjoy and for any family to grow. The Newlands is a wide favourable road, popular with families seeking the excellent nearby schooling. In the heart of Wallington town centre and Purley Way, the convenient location offers the modern family a host of shopping options. Wallington has quite a comprehensive high street with banking, restaurants, supermarkets and independent retailers to choose from. Local schools include Bandon 1. long_description: NO CHAIN! This well-presented two double bedrooms, two bathrooms fourth floor apartment is a perfect home for family! Located on the doorstep of Sutton High Street, the property offers easy access to many shops, restaurants, amenities, outstanding schools, and is just a short walk to Sutton Common and Sutton train station.    Upon entrance to the property, you are greeted by a welcoming hallway with ample storage and the main living space to your right, an airy and bright open plan living/kitchen/dining with incredible floor to ceiling windows providing a remarkable view. The lovely west-facing balcony is a secluded outside space to relax in. The kitchen is fully equipped with integrated appliances and storage cupboards. On the left of the hallway are the two bedrooms. The master bedroom with en-suite and a built-in wardrobe, while the second bedroom is at a tremendous size which can suits all your needs. The family bathroom is a spacious 3-piece with shower over bath. It is a home with convenient location and excellent room sizes, perfect for first time buyers and with high rental value for investors! Call to book your viewing now!   EPC rating: B. Bedroom One: 12'10 x 9'4 Double glazed window to side aspect, wall mounted heater, fitted wardrobe, coved ceiling. En-suite Shower Room: Consisting of tiled cubicle with thermostatic shower, wash hand basin with chrome taps, low level flush WC, tiled flooring, obscure double glazed window to side aspect. Bedroom Two: 14'10 x 8'6 Double glazed window to rear aspect, wall mounted heater, coved ceiling. Bathroom: Comprising panel enclosed bath with chrome mixer tap and shower attachment, wash hand basin with chrome taps, low level flush WC, tiled flooring. Truthfully there is not a lot to say about the current state of this property as its true value lies in its potential but needs a savvy experienced purchaser to make the most of this. As it is, the property comprises living room, dining room, galley kitchen, two double bedrooms and a family bathroom. There is also a patio garden to the rear of the property. The property requires modernisation & redecoration and is just 1/3rd mile to Worcester Park's mainline station & town centre. DESCRIPTION An attractive two bedroom family home situated in a convenient & popular location. This super house enjoys good living space, a rear garden and a driveway to the front. The property requires modernisation & redecoration and is just 1/3rd mile to Worcester Park's mainline station & town centre.  Worcester Park is an ideal destination for commuters, with a direct Zone 4 rail link to Waterloo in under 30 minutes and departing every 15 minutes. Worcester Park is located just off the A3, which offers road links to Central London, the M25 and both of London's Airports. Bus services run to Morden's Northern Line Station in approx. 15 minutes. The attractive & bustling High Street enjoys a host of familiar brands including: Waitrose, Sainsburys, Pizza Express, Nandos, Costa, Caffe Nero, Starbucks Boots, WH Smiths & Superdrug as well as an array of independents.There is a broad selection of pubs & bars and of eateries to satisfy most culinary requests. Young families are attracted to the area's plethora of high performing schools and no less than seven parks. 1. bullet_points: FOUR DOUBLE BEDROOM TOWNHOUSE;SPACIOUS LOUNGE 16'3 X 12'8;QUIET CUL DE SAC LOCATION;LARGE MASTER BEDROOM;UTILITY ROOM;SEPARATE MODERN KITCHEN;CLOSE PROXIMITY TO EXCELLENT SCHOOLS;INTEGRAL GARAGE;FAVOURED SOUTH SUTTON LOCATION;SCOPE TO EXTEND GROUND FLOOR GARAGE - STPP
long_description: The Property ***** OPEN DAY SATURDAY 11TH JUNE ***** BY APPOINTMENT ONLY ***** Purplebricks is delighted to offer to the market this fantastic four bedroom, two bathroom modern Townhouse in the favoured and sought after South Sutton location. This is a superbly presented three/four bedroom modern terraced Townhouse with a good sized private garden with parking for two cars and a smaller car in the integral garage. Sutton rail station is close by, offering a good regular service into London.  as are several excellent schools including 'Overton Grange' the 'Harris Academy', 'Devonshire' and Sutton Grammar. As you enter the property you find an internal porch area for coats and shoes. You have on the ground floor, access to the integral garage which offers lots of storage. There is also a handy shower room and downstairs WC which service the fourth bedroom ( which is a nice arrangement and feels slightly annexed from  the rest of the house - Potentially perfect for those who have family coming over from overseas) . Finally on the ground floor you have an all important utility room though which you have the double glazed door which accesses out onto the low maintenance back garden and patio area. Going up to the first floor you find a nice "horseshoe" shaped modern kitchen  with lots of valuable storage cupboards and work surfaces. Adjoining that is the separate dining room which could quite easily be knocked through . This takes you into the spacious principle reception room spanning the whole of the front of the building. This has large windows in which allows lots of natural light in. You then take the stairs to the top floor of the Townhouse where you find three good sized double bedroom, the mater offering a great footprint of 15'7 x 9'8 and also has full width built in wardrobes. Finally you have the well appointed three piece family bathroom on this floor. This really is a fantastic family home with lots of future potential and we look forward to taking you around. long_description: Tenure:  Leasehold, 119 years remaining Ideally located for the town centre, with super transport links, and access to all amenities. This property is beautifully presented throughout, with practical accommodation and a brand new finish which also benefit from electric underfloor heating throughout. The open plan living room/kitchen is a good size with an integrated fridge freezer, oven, hob, washing machine, and dishwasher. Both bedrooms are double, with wooden flooring and neutral decor.  This apartment is ready for you to move straight in and enjoy. The bathroom is fully tiled, hosts a bath with shower attachment, vanity storage unit, and LED feature mirror. This luxury flat has good space and security and is ideal for couples and first-time buyers, it must be seen internally to be fully appreciated. Fully secured underground car park with one space allocated. Transport - 3 minute walk to Sutton Mainline Station. - 21 minute train to Clapham Junction. - 28 minute train to London Victoria. - 30 minute train to London Bridge. - Bus links to Heathrow, East Croydon, Wimbledon, and Morden. Potential Rental Value: £1400- £1600pcm Lease: 120 years approx The current owners have spent happy years making the apartment their home, they are relocating and it's time for someone else to enjoy this modern flat and its excellent location. A few special gems are Manor Park across the road, secure underground parking, Sutton Station, and all of the shops, schools, GP's and gyms within the very close vicinity. It makes living a lot more enjoyable when everything is local to you. There is a lovely community at Old Inn House- with thoughtful neighbours who are always happy to chat or help you if needed. Tenure: Leasehold (119 years) Ground Rent: £300 per year Brochures Brochure

station_info: [(0.9, 'Sutton Common Station', 'svg-nationalrail'), (0.9, 'West Sutton Station', 'svg-nationalrail'), (1.2, 'St. Helier Station', 'svg-nationalrail')]
long_description: GUIDE PRICE £600,000 - £630,000 Every now and again a home comes to market that is truly exceptional, and this gorgeous 3 bedroom chalet-style semi detached home is one such property. It really is a light and airy house that has been fastidiously cared for by the current owners, having maintained and updated the property throughout their occupation and offers all the space you could wish for, especially if you love to entertain your friends and family.  Location-wise it couldn't get any better! Set within a highly convenient location, you have incredible schooling, transport links and amenities on your doorstep. You'll be spoilt for choice for dining out and going for walks in green open spaces, after all we all need some vit-D after recent events!  Inside the house, the property has benefitted from some modifications for a more 'modern' feel, such as an archway that leads to the lounge, which is a fabulous space for you to snuggle down on a comfy chair with a good book or finally catch up on that box set you've wanting to for some time now. The real heart of the home is always the kitchen, and you'll have generous amount of workspace to really cook up a storm in! Breakfast ready, you'll sitting down with your loved ones in the adjacent dining room, which is semi open plan, looking forward to the day ahead.  Upstairs, the bedrooms will truly impress in what are incredibly spacious proportions with large eaves storage that could be easily extended to incorporate an en-suite, subject to relevant permissions. All the rooms are also served by the beautiful, modern bathroom and separate W/C. Finishing off the internal accommodation, the property ideally has a third bedroom downstairs which is larger than average for the period and ideal for an office, perfect for home working! But there's more! How about a wonderful, mature, South Westerly facing garden that will be great for every age range and a separate garage - with additional parking to front. long_description: Located close to Wallington High School for Girls this two-bedroom, ground-floor apartment comes to the market with garage en-bloc and is perfect both for first time buyers and investors.  The interior has been modernised by its current owners and offers two good-size bedrooms, kitchen, bathroom, separate W.C, hallway with storage and 20ft wide lounge/diner. Additional benefits include communal garden and garage en-bloc.  In addition to Wallington High School for Girls, other popular local schools in Wallington include Wallington Primary Academy and Bandon Hill Meadow Field primary School. Wallington Railway Station offers swift and easy access into a range of destinations including London Bridge, London Victoria, West Croydon & Epsom, while the M23/M25 interchange at Hooley can be used to access the national motorway network. Local bus routes include the 127, 463 and S4. Popular green spaces in Wallington include the historic Beddington Park, while Wallington High Street offers a range of shops, restaurants, gyms and amenities. long_description: New to the market this extended four bedroom, two bathroom family home located on a very popular road in Sutton. This property is set over three floors and has been extended to the rear and to the loft offering versatile living space to suit family living.  The ground floor offers a spacious entrance hall, two reception rooms (with the one to the rear boasting bi-folding doors overlooking the pretty rear garden) and an extended fitted kitchen. The first floor boasts two double bedrooms, a larger than average single bedroom and a family bathroom with separate w.c. On the second floor there is a further double bedroom with a recently fitted en-suite shower room. Further benefits to this lovely home include plenty of storage space, off street parking for several vehicles and a large garage to the rear with electricity and rear access. The area is very popular with both investors and families due to its close proximity to green spaces, transport links, local amenities and a selection of well regarded schools. long_description: SUMMARY Offered to the market with no onward chain is this attractive and very well presented three bedroom semi-detached family home, situated in a town centre location, close to great local schools and the station. DESCRIPTION Offered to the market with no onward chain is this attractive and very well presented three bedroom semi-detached family home, situated in a town centre location, close to great local schools and the station. The property boasts an open plan layout to the ground floor and there are three well-proportioned bedrooms and a family bathroom on the first floor. Outside, there is a southerly aspect rear garden with a decked area and side access. Worcester Park is an ideal destination for commuters, with a direct Zone 4 rail link to Waterloo in under 30 minutes and departing every 15 minutes. Worcester Park is located just off the A3, which offers road links to Central London, the M25 and both of London's Airports. Bus services run to Morden's Northern Line Station in approx. 15 minutes. The attractive & bustling High Street enjoys a host of familiar brands including: Waitrose, Sainsburys, Pizza Express, Nandos, Costa, Cafe Nero, Starbucks, Boots, WH Smiths & Superdrug as well as an array of independents. There is a broad selection of pubs & bars and of eateries to satisfy most culinary requests. Young families are attracted to the area's plethora of high performing schools and no less than seven parks. 1. bullet_points: Allocated parking;Lower Ground Floor;Private Garden;Modern finish;En-suite;Local amenities;Transport links;double-glazed-windows;double-glazed-windows;garden
long_description: This large 2 - double bedroom chain-free apartment with a private garden, an ensuite, an open-plan kitchen-dining-living space, and 2 allocated parking spaces is ideal for a couple or small family who love to entertain!   The open plan design of the main reception and kitchen area is the perfect space to spend time with friends and family or to enjoy individual pursuits. The kitchen hosts plenty of storage alongside a fitted fridge-freezer, dishwasher, and induction hob with an oven.   A unique feature of this property is the beautifully designed private garden. This is a real hidden gem and is an ideal space to enjoy those morning coffees, warm summer evenings, or to utilise as a space for the whole family to enjoy.    Both the master bedroom and the second bedroom is large enough for a king bed, plus additional bedroom furniture and extra storage. The master bedroom has an En-suite with a stand-alone shower and the property also boasts a large separate family bathroom with a three-piece suite.   You can enjoy the privacy of your own space, as this home benefits from having no direct neighbours due to its position on the Lower Ground floor which can be accessed via communal lifts or stairs. It is also the only apartment in the building which benefits from 2 allocated parking spaces within a private car park.   The property is conveniently situated within easy access to National Rail and Underground hubs in Zone 4 - a short walk from the no.80 bus which takes you to Morden Underground station in 20-minutes, and a 12-minute walk from Hackbridge train station which has connections to London Victoria and London Blackfriars within 30 minutes.    Local amenities include pubs, cafes, restaurants, shops, a gym, Carshalton ponds, green spaces along the River Wandle Trail, and more!   Viewings at this home are highly recommended! Tenure: Leasehold Council Tax: c Lease Remaining: 244 Current ground rent: £25.00 Per Month Ground rent review period: every 0  Annual ground rent increase: 1%

long_description: *GUIDE PRICE £350,000 - £375,000* This fantastic two double bedroom MODERN apartment has so much to offer. As you walk into the apartment you are greeted by a SPACIOUS entrance hall which has AMPLE STORAGE space. The OPEN PLAN kitchen / reception room is the perfect space to entertain guests and if you are the cook of the home then you won’t be far from the fun! The kitchen is fully equipped with modern INTEGRATED APPLIANCES. The BALCONY is off the reception room and is a really good size meaning on those summer months you can sit outside with a table and chairs and a tipple of your choice. There are two DOUBLE bedrooms and the FAMILY BATHROOM is also modern. This property offers plenty of OFF STREET PARKING and comes with a LONG LEASE.  Ferndale Crescent is conveniently located near great transport links, just moments from a bus stop that takes you to MORDEN UNDERGROUND in around twenty minutes. It is also a short walk from HACKBRIDGE train station which offers connections to LONDON VICTORIA and BLACKKFRIARS within thirty minutes. Carshalton offers popular amenities including SHOPS, RESTAURANTS, and STUNNING WALKS. Viewings are highly recommended to really appreciate this fantastic apartment. bullet_points: Stunning 3 double bedroom apartment;Prestigious block & location;Excellent internal order;Share of freehold;First floor;Garage en-bloc;Separate cloakroom;Lounge/Diner
long_description: Being the premium road to own an apartment in Sutton, Christchurch Park really is as good as it gets. So why is this the location where everyone aspires to live? Well all you have to do is just take a walk down this leafy suburban oasis, where the road is full of amazing properties, situated in the most prestigious of buildings.  So, how does Amberley Court compare? The great news is that you'll be living in one of the most desirable blocks, with this also being one of the largest properties.  What make this particular home just so special, is it's failure to compromise in any way. Offered in excellent condition, there are 3 double bedrooms and a huge living/dining space which you'll love to entertain not just the family in, but also when you decide to have your friends around for a dinner party!  When that occasion arrives, you'll be able to throw a lavish banquet given the amount of workspace in your large kitchen, that is fabulously appointed and overlooks the communal gardens. In fact, fantastic views are available in every room - with light pouring in from the large windows as you are set on the first floor. Further benefitting the property is a wonderful bathroom and separate cloakroom, a real rarity in a purpose built apartment of any age.  Outside, the well established and cared for communal gardens wrap around the building, having ample space for the kids to play in or for you to take some time to relax. Parking wise, all bases are covered with a garage en-bloc and guests are well catered for with visitors spaces.  But Christchurch Park isn't just coveted for it's setting. It is also a road that is a short walk to Sutton mainline station and incredible shopping and restaurants on your doorstep. What's more, there is access to one of Sutton's main attractions - your children will be able to receive some of the best schooling in the country. bullet_points: - Three Bedrooms;- Detached;- Detached Garage;- Handsome Appearance;- Swift linking trains in Central London;- Flint Faced;- Affluent location;- SM2 Postcode;- Close to Royal Marsden/Harris Academy
long_description: The Gallop is as good as it sounds; a wide affluent road providing the perfect back drop to the impressive property found here. The local roads, namely The Linkway/The Highway/The Causeway/Heath Drive, make up the quarter and are characterised by the similar large detached property. The area is a settled, neighbourly community with a plethora of amenities on hand. Superb Schooling is standard within Sutton and this house has Harris academy and Seaton House within a short walk, transport is easy with local buses linking local town centres and train stations linking Central London with easy distances, although it’s the features such as Royal Marsden and the entrance to Banstead Downs that are slightly more unique.    From every angle this house holds a powerful handsome gaze. The garden envelopes the property and wraps around giving multiple dimensions whilst the large driveway beckons you in. To the side of the property, the double detached garage is an ideal storage solution or special parking facility. Internally, the property has three bedrooms, two reception rooms, kitchen, family bathroom and separate W.C. Its right to point out that the property has bags of character and is easy to live in, due to its size its best suited to small families, couples and down sizers. The property had historic planning permission (dated 2001) to extend; those with a keen architectural eye could reveal in this option and achieve something very special.   The rear portion of the garden faces south ensuring a very sunny disposition. The plot measures just over .22 of an acre.    Quite simply we implore you to view ASAP. Whilst other house may offer more accommodation, they certainly cannot offer the complete package of location, kerb appeal and character. These houses are generational assets and once they are gone tend to stay off market for some time; act now to take part in the next chapter of this house.      IMPORTANT NOTE TO PURCHASERS:  We endeavour to make our sales particulars accurate and reliable, however, they do not constitute or form part of an offer or any contract and none is to be relied upon as statements of representation or fact. Any services, systems and appliances listed in this specification have not been tested by us and no guarantee as to their operating ability or efficiency is given. All measurements have been taken as a guide to prospective buyers only, and are not precise. Please be advised that some of the particulars may be awaiting vendor approval. If you require clarification or further information on any points, please contact us, especially if you are traveling some distance to view. Fixtures and fittings other than those mentioned are to be agreed with the seller.   GCH220080/2

The property has been well loved by the current owners and benefits from a superb sized family reception with direct access to the paved rear garden, luxury contemporary kitchen/diner with exquisite centre island, bi-fold doors to rear garden and access to utility room and garage. bullet_points: New lease - 176 Years;Excellent buy to let investment;Ideal first time buy;Convenient location;Tremendously bright interior;Modern & stylish throughout;Fully equipped bespoke kitchen;Luxury fully tiled shower room;Private allocated parking;Electric car charging point
long_description: This bright and stylish Two bedroom top floor apartment set within this small modern building is a superb buy to let investment or ideal first time purchase. Sold with a newly extended lease to 176 years and presented in excellent order throughout with a contemporary theme.  The dual aspect lounge with its space for separate lounge and dining areas also features a galleried staircase, Oak flooring and has sky cube already installed! The kitchen is a unique design with contrasting black and white high gloss units with under unit lighting and roll top works surfaces, all appliances are AEG and fully integrated and include a gas hob & chrome extractor hood. dishwasher, washing machine and fridge with separate freezer. The master bedroom boasts fabulous views of Woodcote Green with a dual aspect and comes with a range of fitted wardrobes, air conditioning and a modern white theme. The second double bedroom has a rear garden aspect, high ceilings for storage and a vertical radiator. There is a superb bespoke fully tiled double shower room with mains powered shower, cistern enclosed w/c, recessed wash basin with electric shaver point and heated towel rail. Complimenting this must see apartment is private allocated parking with electric car charging point, maintained communal gardens and secure video entry phone system. Landing / Entrance Hall  - Reached via the private entrance and internal stair case which is galleried to the lounge. With fitted storage, doors to all rooms & oak flooring. Living Room  - 5.82m x 4.42m (19'1 x 14'6) - The bright sociable and spacious dual aspect lounge dining room with its black out blinds & velux windows also features oak wood flooring, galleried stair case with storage above and a sky cube system. With space for a large lounge suite and dining furniture and lovely aspects this is a great space for living, working and entertaining. Kitchen  - 3.86m x 2.97m (12'8 x 9'9) - The bespoke kitchen with its unique design offers ample food preparation and storage space with contrasting high gloss units and roll top work surfaces, under unit lighting and integrated appliances make for a stylish cooking environment. All appliances are "AEG" and include integrated fridge and freezer, gas hob with vented extractor hood above, washer drier and dishwasher. The "Worcester" combination boiler is located in the useful eaves storage cupboard and has been serviced under a British gas agreement. With ceramic floor tiles and a pleasant rear aspect Master Bedroom  - 4.93m x 2.90m (16'2 x 9'6) - This large double bedroom boasts a lovely dual aspect with views of Woodcote Green with double glazed sash and velux windows. Complete with a range of fitted wardrobes & air conditioning. Bedroom Two  - 3.86m x 2.97m (12'8 x 9'9) - The second double bedroom with its rear aspect is generous in size and works as a lovely nursery / home office or as previously a home gym. With high ceilings and vertical radiator. Shower Room  - This luxurious fully tiled double shower room fitted with "Armitage shanks" sanitary wear comes with a cistern enclosed w/c and recessed wash basin, cosmetic shelving and storage, heated towel rail and a rear aspect. Outside Rear  - To the rear of the property is a secluded private and maintained communal garden accessed via a secure private entrance. The private allocated parking pace is adjacent to the property and comes with secure electric car charging point. Outside Front  - With a welcoming secure communal entrance with video Entryphone system, secure personal mail boxes and maintained communal gardens. Brochures Woodcote Green, Wallington Brochure

bullet_points: Spacious 2 bedroom apartment;Prestigious gated development;Second floor with balcony;Double bedrooms, Spacious hallway;Large kitchen with ample storage;Residents parking;Excellent internal order;Wonderful communal grounds;Fantastic location for amenities and transport;Block caretaker Monday to Friday
long_description: Few apartments come to market that offer as much as Beechwood Court. Positioned in one of the most desirable developments in the area, this fabulous apartment offers a great layout and size.  Inside, you'll be amazed sitting in your spacious living room that doesn't just have ample room for you to sit back and relax in but also has space for you to dine, whether it be with family or friends, grabbing breakfast with the kids before work or even when you throw one of your dinner parties.  What's more, all the light and airy rooms have pleasing elevated views front and rear, with the balcony having a sensational vantage across the communal courtyard grounds, also boasting a storage cupboard. So, what about the rest of the rooms? Well you'll certainly not be disappointed with the lovely, well-proportioned kitchen, that has ample storage with space to really cook up a storm in.  When it's time to catch up on some sleep, we'll bet that you'll have an amazing nights sleep in your large master bedroom that is a sanctuary of style and peace - with you also having lots of integrated wardrobe space.  The second bedroom is also a fantastic size and one which is perfect for your kids or friends when they stay, and is certainly big enough for you to also set up your home office in, which is invaluable during these times. All the rooms are served by a spacious bathroom that you can really chill out and relax in after a hard day of zoom calls! Outside, the access into Beechwood Court is via gates that lead to the fabulous landscaped gardens that wrap around the buildings, that really do add even more lustre to this already prestigious block. Lastly we have to mention the location. You are incredibly close to Carshalton, Wallington & Sutton, with fabulous shopping & amenities, along with you being a stones throw from the Carshalton station. Lastly how can we not mention the schools? If needed, the kids will benefit from some of the finest education in the country Second Floor  -  Hallway  -  Living/Dining Room  - 5.33m x 3.96m (17'6 x 13') -  Kitchen  - 4.14m x 2.49m (13'7 x 8'2) -  Bedroom 1  - 4.70m x 3.33m (15'5 x 10'11) -  Bedroom 2  - 4.22m x 3.18m (13'10 x 10'5) -  Bathroom  - 3.05m x 1.57m (10 x 5'2) -  Outside  -  Balcony  -  Communal Grounds  -  Communal Parking  -  Brochures West Street Lane, Carshalton Brochure

DESCRIPTION One double bedroom beautifully presented flat, located on a popular private residential development in Hackbridge, benefits from: lovingly renovated through-out, ample storage, allocated parking and communal gardens.  The first floor apartment offers a spacious reception room with dining area, and separate fitted kitchen with integrated stainless steel sink and space for oven, washing machine and fridge-freezer. The double bedroom is has ample storage with built in wardrobes.    Foxglove Way offers easy access to a range of public transport options including Hackbridge station (ZONE 4) which is a short walk and has regular services on Southern Rail to Balham (Northern Line), Clapham Junction (19 min), Victoria (27 min), Blackfriars (32 min) and London Bridge (35 min). The A23 offers routes into the centre of London, as well as linking to the M25 and the South Circular Road for access to the surrounding areas and throughout the region. long_description: SUMMARY A fantastic four bedroom family home ideally situated, close to Wallington Grammar schools, Railway stations and Mellows Park. DESCRIPTION A fantastic home consisting of four bedrooms, family bathroom, a downstairs WC,  generous reception rooms, separate kitchen, conservatory area, garden, garage and drive. The quality of the building, location, room sizes and proximity to amenities are all important and this property ticks all those boxes. The property is ideally situated, close to Wallington Grammar schools, station and Mellows Park. On the ground floor, this family home boasts a large hallway with WC, two generous reception room, recently renovated separate kitchen and garden conservatory, along with ample under-stair storage. Moving upstairs, there are three spacious bedrooms, and a family bathroom, that follows onto the top floor which hosts the master bedroom with en-suite shower room and plenty of storage. Externally, this family home comes complete with an easily maintained rear garden, garage and off street parking at the front of the property. The property is situated within walking distance from Mellows Park, offers access to all the Grammar schools in the area and Hackbridge and Wallington station are close. 1. long_description: Soon as you lead up to the property you are invited to a stunning level paved steps and a low maintenance lawn at the front. Once you open the door you walk into an impressive large hallway with loads of natural light, down stairs boasts WC with sink, spacious front room with bay windows, a grand open plan kitchen perfect for the modern day family which has abundance of storage, island style breakfast table, head to toe wall mounted units, fitted appliances and a large dining area with bifolding doors leading on to a low maintenance garden which is perfect for spending time with friends and family. Leading upstairs to the first floor you have to spacious modern three-piece suite bathroom with separate shower cubical, two spacious double bedroom and single bedroom. On the second floor leads on to the main bedroom with abundance of natural light, eve storage and stunning en-suite. This truly spectacular home will not stay on the market long. long_description: SellMyHome are proud to present to market this fantastic two bedroom, semi detached family home located in a highly sought after area of Sutton, Surrey. This property is being offered on a chain free basis. The property briefly comprises welcoming hallway, front reception room with french doors leading to outside garden, kitchen/diner, two bedrooms; primary bedroom with en-suite and built in wardrobes, second bedroom with fitted wardrobes and family bathroom. Outside, there are two parking space for the property and rear garden. Further benefitting from great transport links to commute routes and close by to West Sutton, Cheam & Sutton train station with good connections to London Victoria & London Bridge. This specific area is within catchment areas for outstanding schools from primary to sixth form. The vendors have created a rustic homemade garden bar to help any new purchaser take advantage of hosting friends and family. Please contact the SellMyHome team to book in your viewing appointment and avoid missing out on this amazing property! long_description: BOOK YOUR VIEWING NOW!!  An exciting new development of just four luxury detached family homes set in a small mews style cul de sac in central Wallington very close to the mainline station , three excellent local grammar schools and a vibrant bustling high street offering all your shopping needs with a plethora of independent shops , bars and restaurants.  These four brand new houses are offered in two styles The Beeches & The Firs both which offer a bespoke finish and offer impressively large gardens and the rare benefit of a garage as well as masses of off road parking. The Beeches :Features include a stunning fully equipped kitchen dining room with a large living room across the rear leading out to the sunny patio and garden. The Firs : Features include a good size living room and a huge kitchen dining room/living room with quality Bosch appliances , with bi-fold doors across the rear leading out to the sunny patio and garden. Both styles are thoughtfully designed with the modern lifestyle in mind , and benefits include: two stylish en-suites, a large reception hall, the quality kitchens offer soft close doors , high end Bosch appliances including a wine cooler , and breakfast bars , individually controlled underfloor heating, quality carpets in the bedrooms and hardwearing porcelain tiles in the main living areas.  CALL NOW FOR MORE INFORMATION Situation Situated in central Wallington, only a few hundred meters to the shopping centre and mainline train station with good links to Central London , the south coast  and beyond .  Other shopping centres within easy reach include Carshalton Village, Sutton and Croydon.  There are three well regarded local grammar schools: Wilsons, Wallington High School for Girls and Wallington Grammar.  IMPORTANT NOTE TO POTENTIAL PURCHASERS & TENANTS:  We endeavour to make our particulars accurate and reliable, however, they do not constitute or form part of an offer or any contract and none is to be relied upon as statements of representation or fact. Payment of all utilities including water rates or metered supply and Council Tax is the responsibility of the tenant in every case.  WLN210112/2 Brochures Web Details

long_description: ** VIEWING DAY BY APPOINTMENT ON THE 11TH JUNE** The Personal Agent are proud to be able to present to the market this substantial, four bedroom detached residence which is situated near shops, sought after schools and excellent transport links. The property offers a 24ft lounge / dining room which has double doors to the garden and is semi open plan to a high quality kitchen / breakfast room. To the rear of the property is a double glazed conservatory measuring over 22ft in length. The other side of the entrance hallway is a further spacious, double aspect reception room. Upstairs are four generously proportioned bedrooms (three double bedrooms and one large single bedroom) and a stylish and contemporary family bathroom with jacuzzi bath. To the front of the property is a driveway which provides parking for at least two cars, while to the side and rear is a garden which is part laid to lawn and part landscaped. A recently built detached insulated timber summer house with full electrics and WiFi Early viewing essential. Sole agents. Worcester Park offers a larger choice of amenities including a Waitrose, banks/building societies and other essential stores, as well as a variety of restaurants, Worcester Park also offers great access to public transport including the 93 bus which is a few stops away from Morden underground station. Tenure - Freehold Council tax band - E Brochures Langley Avenue, Worcester Park Brochure

bullet_points: One Bedroom;Cellar;Garden;Off Road Parking;Show Home Condition;garden;sought-after-location;period-features-character
long_description: This wonderfully presented one bedroom apartment with garden is located in Carshalton Beeches within walking distance of both Carshalton and Carshalton Beeches stations giving you easy access to City of London and close to the local shops, restaurants and amenities.The accommodation comprises entrance hall, bedroom with built in cupboard, bathroom with storage cupboard and sky light, ultra modern open plan living space with fitted kitchen/dining area and sitting area all in one space.This wonderful apartment also comes with the added benefits of a cellar (which subject to planning could become another room), a fantastic garden offering outside space to sit and relax in and free street parking.A note from the owners:  We have loved living in this charming flat in the perfect position in Carshalton village - with quick access to London and also to Surrey and Kent. Within half an hour you can be within sight of the river Thames or, in the other direction, the stunning Surrey Hills and we are well served with two stations, Carshalton Beeches and Carshalton, with trains going to London Bridge, Victoria and Croydon - plus the Thameslink. Gatwick and Luton airports are within easy reach, and it’s 15 minutes to the M25. There’s also a night bus back from Morden tube for any late nights in town.   Carshalton has a friendly, quintessential village feel and we’ve loved exploring the many local pubs (The Sun and The Greyhound are our favourites), herring spotting at the ponds (complete with a cute tea and scones spot), quirky independent shops, the several parks in the area, the small biodiversity nature reserve, golf, activity centre with rock climbing, gym, swimming pool, and of course the famous lavender fields nearby. The flat itself is full of character, which is why we fell in love with it - it has good bones! We’ve just added a new hob and oven and it’s had a fresh paint and new carpet. We’ve found having a cellar really handy for storage and have loved having an outdoor space to sit in. Tenure: Shared Freehold Council Tax: B Lease Remaining: 999 Current ground rent: £0.00 Per Year Ground rent review period: every 12 years Annual ground rent increase: 2%

bullet_points: Open Day - Saturday 18th June - book your appointment today;A spacious and well presented three bedroom end of terrace house located in a popular residential setting within half a mile of several excellent local schools;Accommodation incorporates an enclosed storm porch, generous living room, refitted kitchen/dining room and a shower room on the ground floor, with three beds and an ensuite upstairs;Off street parking for two cars, a wide gated walkway through to a sunny & secure 65 ft west-facing garden - perfect for kids and pets;Central heating, double glazing, potential for extension both under permitted development and with the usual planning consents;Vacant possession - no onwards chain;EPC rating: E (54/84);Stanley Park Juniors, Bandon Hill Woodfield are within 0.5 miles, 10 minutes walk to the open Surrey countryside, 15 - 17 minutes walk to both Carshalton Beeches & Wallington BR stations, five Grammar;Viewing is strongly recommended - so call today to book an appointment to visit.
long_description: Open Day - Saturday 18th June. Silverman Black is delighted to offer this spacious and well presented three bedroom, two bathroom end-terrace house located in a popular and sought after street in Carshalton on the Hill. Positioned within easy walking distance of Stanley Park Juniors and Bandon Hill (Woodfield), this property affords well proportioned family accommodation which incorporates an enclosed porch extension, a generous living room, a refitted & well equipped kitchen/dining room and a shower room on the ground floor, with three good size bedrooms and an ensuite shower room upstairs.  Externally, the property offers from private off street parking for two vehicles at the front of the house, gated access to a sizable side plot and a sunny, west facing rear garden which extends over 65 ft in length - perfect for children, pets and family get-togethers! Other benefits include double glazing & gas/radiator central heating, whilst there is potential under "permitted development" or subject to the usual planning consents, to extend the property into the loft, to the rear or to incorporate a "wrap-around" ground floor facility! Perfectly located for access to some of the Borough's  favoured schools (excellent Primary & Junior facilities & there are 5 Grammar Schools within a 3 mile radius), the open Surrey countryside is only 10 minutes walk away whilst both Carshalton Beeches and Wallington BR stations are approximately 0.75 miles away (15 - 17 minutes walk). Being sold vacant and with no onward chain, viewing of this ideal family home is highly recommended - so call today to book your appointment. Brochures Windborough Road, Carshalton Brochure

bullet_points: One bedroom first floor apartment;Fantastic order throughout;No forward chain;Fully Fitted Kitchen with Integrated Appliances;Lodge manager available 5 days a week;Owners' Lounge & Kitchen with regular social events;24 hour Careline system for safety and security;Guest Suite for visitors & use of over 100 guest suites in Churchill Retirement lodges across the country;Owners' private car park;Great location close to the town centre & excellent transport links
long_description: Stratton and King are delighted to be marketing this stunning one bedroom first floor apartment, conveniently located for the lift and stairs. The property offers deceptively spacious accommodation throughout and is presented in fantastic order. The Lounge offers ample space for living and dining room furniture and has a feature electric fireplace with attractive surround. The Kitchen, which is accessed via the lounge, offers a range of eye and base level units with working surfaces over and tiled splashbacks. There is a built in waist height oven, 4 ring electric hob with extractor hood over, a fridge and a freezer. A window allows for light and ventilation. The Bedroom is a generous double room with a useful built in mirrored wardrobe and plenty of space for additional bedroom furniture if required. The Shower Room offers a large curved shower cubicle with handrail, heated towel rail, a WC and wash hand basin with vanity unit beneath. Perfectly complementing this wonderful apartment is a useful storage cupboard located in the hallway.  Bramble Lodge is a stylish development of 42 one and two bedroom retirement apartments in Wallington, a London Borough of Sutton. The Freedom Pass really comes into its own in the area with free travel on almost all public transport in London allowing you to take full advantage of the many shopping, theatre and leisure attractions. Wallington town centre offers a wealth of High Street stores, coffee shops and restaurants as well as a weekend farmers market for fresh local produce. Transport links are excellent with frequent bus services from right outside the Lodge, to direct trains into London Bridge and Victoria stations.  The Lodge manager is on hand throughout the day to support the Owners and keep the development in perfect shape as well as arranging many regular events in the Owners’ Lounge from coffee mornings to games afternoons.  A Guest Suite is available for visitors & use of over 150 guest suites in Retirement lodges across the country. Prices are available on request from the Lodge Manager.  Bramble Lodge has been designed with safety and security at the forefront, The Apartment has an emergency Careline system installed, monitored by the onsite Lodge Manager during the day and 24 hours, 365 days a year by the Careline team. Careline integrated intruder alarm, secure video entry system and sophisticated fire and smoke detection systems throughout both the apartment and communal areas provide unrivalled peace of mind. Bramble Lodge has a fully equipped laundry room and a private owners’ car park.   Bramble Lodge is managed by the award winning Millstream Management Services, working closely with Churchill Retirement Living and Stratton & King to maintain the highest standards of maintenance and service for every lodge and owner.   Bramble Lodge requires at least one apartment resident to be over the age of 60 with any second resident over the age of 55.    Additional Information Service charge (Year Ending 31st May 2022): £2,101.81 per annum. Ground Rent:  £588.65 per annum.  Council Tax: Band C  125 year lease commencing 2011  Please check regarding Pets with Millstream Management Services Limited Service charges include: Careline system, buildings insurance, water and sewerage rates, communal cleaning, utilities and maintenance, garden maintenance, lift maintenance, lodge manager and a contribution to the contingency fund.  A 1% contribution of the final selling price to the contingency fund is payable by the Seller upon completion of the sale of the property.   DESCRIPTION Measurements are approximate and some may be maximum on irregular walls.   CONSENTS We have not had sight of any relevant building regulations, guarantees or planning consents all relevant documentation pertaining to this property should be checked with your legal advisor before exchanging contracts.   Property Particulars Disclaimer: These particulars are intended only as general guidance. The Company therefore gives notice that none of the material issued or visual depictions of any kind made on behalf of the Company can be relied upon as accurately describing any of the Specified Matters prescribed by any Order made under the Consumer Protection from Unfair Trading Regulations, 2008. Nor do they constitute a contract, part of a contract or a warranty. Brochures Full Details

long_description: SUMMARY A stunning and spacious two bedroom top floor apartment with a large and fabulous 'wrap-around' balcony forming part of this exclusive contemporary and stylish development in the heart of Worcester Park, close to the town centre and 1/4 mile of the station. An early viewing is strongly advised. DESCRIPTION A stunning and spacious two bedroom top floor apartment with a large and fabulous 'wrap-around' balcony forming part of this exclusive contemporary and stylish development in the heart of Worcester Park, close to the town centre and 1/4 mile of the station. An early viewing is strongly advised. Worcester Park is an ideal destination for commuters, with a direct Zone 4 rail link to Waterloo in under 30 minutes and departing every 15 minutes. Worcester Park is located just off the A3, which offers road links to Central London, the M25 and both of London's Airports. Bus services run to Morden's Northern Line Station in approx. 15 minutes. The attractive & bustling High Street enjoys a host of familiar brands including: Waitrose, Sainsburys, Pizza Express, Nandos, Costa, Caffe Nero, Starbucks Boots, WH Smiths & Superdrug as well as an array of independents.There is a broad selection of pubs & bars and of eateries to satisfy most culinary requests. Young families are attracted to the area's plethora of high performing schools and no less than seven parks. We currently hold lease details as displayed above, should you require further information please contact the branch.  Please note additional fees could be incurred for items such as leasehold packs. 1. long_description: Paul Graham are delighted to offer this spacious 5 bedroom detached house on one of South Wallington's most sought after roads. Features include a 17ft reception hall, 2 separate reception rooms, conservatory, kitchen and breakfast room on the ground floor. The first floor has 4 good sized bedrooms and a family bathroom and the 2nd floor has another double bedroom with an en-suite shower room, a separate WC and a walk in eaves storage. The front garden has off street parking for several cars and access to garage. The rear garden is in excess of 100ft benefitting from a summer house, sheds and jacuzzi. This fantastic two bedroom first floor maisonette with direct access to a fabulous 60ft private rear garden is immaculately presented throughout & situated in a popular location close to local amenities & transport links. Lovely bright & airy lounge/dining room, modern fitted kitchen, stunning bathroom, two good size bedrooms & 950-years remaining on the lease! This beautifully presented, two bedroom first floor maisonette is offered for sale benefiting from direct access onto a fabulous 60ft private rear garden, where you'll be able to invite all of your friends & family over for BBQ's in the Summer. The property itself boasts a bright & airy reception room that features a lovely fireplace as its main focal point & plenty of space for relaxing in front of the TV & space for a dining table & chairs. There are two good size bedrooms and a stunning bathroom that was recently refurbished.  Other features include gas central heating, double glazed windows, loft access offering great storage space and 950 year lease, £50 pa ground rent & zero service charges!

Should you view, offer or bid on the property, your information will be shared with the Auctioneer, iamsold. This method of auction requires both parties to complete the transaction within 56 days of the draft contract for sale being received by the buyers solicitor. This additional time allows buyers to proceed with mortgage finance (subject to lending criteria, affordability and survey). The buyer is required to sign a reservation agreement and make payment of a non-refundable Reservation Fee. This being 3.6% of the purchase price including VAT, subject to a minimum of £6,000.00 including VAT. The Reservation Fee is paid in addition to purchase price and will be considered as part of the chargeable consideration for the property in the calculation for stamp duty liability. Buyers will be required to go through an identification verification process with iamsold and provide proof of how the purchase would be funded. This property has a Buyer Information Pack which is a collection of documents in relation to the property. The documents may not tell you everything you need to know about the property, so you are required to complete your own due diligence before bidding. A sample copy of the Reservation Agreement and terms and conditions are also contained within this pack. The buyer will also make payment of £300.00 including VAT towards the preparation cost of the pack, where it has been provided by iamsold. The property is subject to an undisclosed Reserve Price with both the Reserve Price and Starting Bid being subject to change. long_description: This two bedroom, ground floor purpose built apartment situated within easy reach of Wallington high street and train station is being offered with No Onward Chain.  Presented in good decorative condition the property briefly comprises a spacious Lounge/dining room with French doors overlooking the front, a separate kitchen, security Entryphone system, two good size bedrooms, modern bathroom suite, hallway storage cupboards, garage en bloc. This ground floor purpose built flat is offered with No Onward Chain.  The property is accessed via a security Entryphone system & communal entrance with its front door opening into the hallway. A built in cupboard provides useful storage space, doors open into all rooms. The Lounge/dining room is a good size with French doors overlooking the front.  A seperate kitchen features a range of fitted cupboards with worktop surfaces, space for fridge/freezer, washing machine & built in oven & hob. There are two bedrooms and a tiled bathroom providing a panel enclosed bath with an overhead shower, wash hand basin and low level w/c. Outside, there is a garage en bloc and access onto communal gardens. Brochures Particulars

long_description: DEVELOPMENT/REFURBISHMENT OPPORTUNITY - Planning submitted for a 9 unit new build scheme, currently incorporating 6 one bedroom, 2 two bedroom and 1 three bedroom penthouse apartments, pending approval.  Please contact us for further details. A fantastic opportunity to purchase this detached family home, located in a prime South Sutton position close to Sutton mainline station and the high street. With planning submitted, the new owners will have the opportunity to fine tune the development and see it through these final stages to acceptance.  Alternatively, if you are looking for a family home, other opportunities include the potential to extend and refurbish - subject to the relevant consents - to create a substantial family home within this highly desirable location, that is also well shielded for such a town center position. The house itself currently comprises 2 large receptions, kitchen/breakfast room and study, with the further benefit of a garden room and cloakroom serving these ground floor rooms. To the first floor, there are 4 bedrooms and family bathroom, with the house still boasting a wealth of original features.  On the outside, the south facing rear garden is perfectly proportioned, wrapping around the house to the front, where a driveway provides ample parking. The garage shows the potential to extend, where you are able to create a house that matches the specific needs or your family, in a location that you've always dreamed of. bullet_points: One Double Bedroom Ground Floor Flat;Lease - 144 Years Remaining;0.4 Miles To Wallington Train Station;Ideal For First Time Buyers & Young Professionals;Recently Refurbished Throughout;Open Plan Kitchen-Living Room;Newly Fitted Kitchen & Shower Room;Professionally Insulated Throughout;Double Glazed & Central Heating
long_description: Tenure:  Leasehold, 144 years remaining The Property One double bedroom ground floor flat recently refurbished throughout with open plan kitchen-living room, 144 year lease, newly fitted kitchen & shower room, communal gardens and within 0.4 miles to Wallington train station making this ideal for 1st time buyers, young professionals and commuters to central London. The building has a secure communal entrance for residents and the flat is located on the ground floor. The property has an entrance hallway with storage cupboard space to one side. There is a spacious open plan kitchen-living room area with a large floor to ceiling window allowing plenty of natural light into the room. The newly fitted kitchen area has cupboard space to two sides, integrated gas hob, fan oven, washing machine and space for a fridge-freezer. There is a breakfast bar area with seating space for 3. The double bedroom benefits from built in wardrobes along one wall and the newly fitted shower room has a shower cubicle, w/c, hand basin with storage below and heated towel rail. The seller has stated that the flat has recently been professionally insulated throughout to help tackle the increasing heating bills. There are also two heat recovery units installed to control humidity levels within the property. Outside - There are well maintained communal gardens to the front & rear. Lease Length Remaining - 144 years. Service Charge - £77.58 pcm. Ground Rent - £0.00 Location The property is located 0.4 miles from Wallington train station which has links into London Victoria and London Bridge. Wallington high street is a short walk away (under 5 minutes) and offers a good range of shops, restaurants and local amenities for all ages. bullet_points: A delightful, extended four bedroom Edwardian semi detached house located on a generous end plot with almost endless potential;Easy access to Wallington Girls, John Fisher, Wilsons, Wallington County (Boys) and even Whitgift schools;Huge entrance hall, two substantial reception rooms, kitchen/breakfast room, cloak/shower room on the ground floor, four double bedrooms & a family bathroom (plus additional shower facilities) upstair;Off street parking for several vehicles plus a large attached garage - 160 ft x 32 ft rear garden - ideal for kids, pets, family BBQs and al-fresco dining;Almost endless potential for extension (STPP) with possibilities of a two storey side addition or ground floor wrap around - or both. Potential for annex;EPC rating: D (61/79);Viewing is extremely strongly recommended - so call today to book your appointment
long_description: Silverman Black is delighted to offer this substantial, extended four bedroom Edwardian semi detached house located on the Wallington/Purley borders, within easy reach of Wallington High School for Girls, John Fisher, Wilsons, Wallington (Boys) County Grammar  and even Whitgift School. Affording spacious and well-proportioned living accommodation, occupying a sizable end plot with close to 160 ft of rear garden and being in close proximity to several of the area's top rated schools,  this property will appeal to a broad spectrum of buyers! The original configuration of the property saw two very large independent reception rooms and an open plan kitchen/breakfast room located on the ground floor, with three generous double bedrooms and a family bathroom at first floor level - but over the years, a downstairs cloak/shower room has been added and a fourth double bedroom has been created in the loft space. In addition, shower facilities have been added in the main bedroom and the attic bedroom- so there are shower facilities on every floor, in addition to the family bathroom. Externally, the property has off street parking for several vehicles in front of a large attached garage - with the rear garden being a particular delight! Extending 160 ft x 32 ft, the garden is a mixture of mature lawns, well stocked & colourful flower borders, "secret gardens" for the kids to explore, a vegetable patch and even a large "hidden" summer house! Of course, the sheer scope of the garden would suggest that substantial further extension could be possible (STPP) with space for either a two storey side addition or a ground floor "wrap-around" - or both! In addition, one of the neighbours already has a stunning self contained one bed annex - so this would also be a possibility for anyone with older relatives. Purley and Wallington town centres and transport facilities are close at hand. Call today to book your appointment to view. Brochures Foresters Drive, Wallington Brochure

long_description: This fabulous two double bedroom duplex apartment is located within close proximity of Sutton railway station and town centre. This modern apartment offers superb, spacious accommodation laid out over two floors. The apartment is accessed at the top floor -  a large entrance hall welcomes you into the apartment with two storage cupboards; there is a bright living/dining room with a divide to the modern kitchen and a range of integrated appliance and ample work space and cupboards. Also to this level is the second double bedroom with fitted wardrobes and access to the jack and jill bath/shower room which can also be used as a cloakroom for visitors.  The staircase leads up to the second level which provides the master bedroom with fitted wardrobes, large built in cupboard and a luxury ensuite shower room. The apartment also comes with an allocated parking space. The seller has provided us with the services charges and lease details. These charges and lease details will need to be confirmed via the solicitors. Length of lease: 113 years  Service Charge: £1,060 P/A Ground Rent: £600 P/A Council Tax Band: D Albion Road is located in a sought after area of South Sutton, with only a short walk to Sutton station for transport links. A wide range of shops and eateries can be found on Sutton High Street. Excellent location for local schools. Brochures Fairwyns Court, 46 Albion Road, Sutton Brochure

Numerous well-regarded schools are close by including the sought after Nonsuch High School for Girls.  Accommodation comprises an exceptionally large living/dining room with dual aspect and Juliet balcony, a modern fitted kitchen, storage cupboard, two spacious double bedrooms with the Principal bedroom offering Juliet balcony, fitted wardrobes and ensuite-shower room and the family bathroom.   Outside, there are two allocated underground parking spaces with access by lift, and the block boasts secure entry via a video intercom system. No onward chain. Brochures Web Details Particulars

It also benefits from a roller canopy over the terrace, a modern fitted kitchen with dining area and allocated parking. long_description: POPULAR BEDDINGTON LOCATION! UPSTAIRS BATHROOM! CONSERVATORY! GARDEN! PARKING ON SITE! Situated in a cul de sac location just 0.6 miles from Waddon station, this two bedroom house in a popular Beddington location boasts a private garden with parking on block, as well as an upstairs bathroom and downstairs toilet . Further benefits include a 'C' EPC rating and gas central heating making this property an ideal first time purchase, upsize or buy to let. The popular 'Beddington park' is under one mile away, while the peaceful retreat of 'Waddon ponds' is just half a mile.  Upon entering, you are greeted with a generously sized hallway with a door leading to the handy downstairs toilet and another door leading to the modern kitchen. Downstairs, the property also boats a generously sized lounge and lean to which could have a multitude of uses, including home office and dining area. The property also boasts an attractive private garden with a large shed storage and feature lighting.  Upstairs the property features 2 good size bedrooms, both with in built storage, a bathroom and access to the loft via hatch in the hall.  Feature lighting and spotlights feature throughout the property which give the property a modern and bright feel. Contact John Dallas for your personal appointment time- video tour is available on request.  Hall   Entrance door. Downstairs toilet with sink. Window to side.
